concept.title: Event Setup
concept.abstract: Admins must decide on the event's Registration Style. The Registration Style dictates the features available for the planned event.

conbody.p:
The Simple Event is best for events that do not have any schedule items or breakout sessions. Community Portal users can purchase an unlimited number of tickets for a Simple Event. Examples of Simple Events include:
Comedy Shows
Alumni Bus Trips
Benefit Concerts
Movie Premieres

The Conference Event is best for events that have schedule items and breakout sessions. Community Portal users are limited to purchasing a single ticket, if registering for themselves, for a Conference Event. Examples of Conference Events include:
Corporate Conferences
Shareholder Meetings
Alumni Weekends
Academic Symposiums
